name: Blue Onion Labs
headline: Single source of truth for a company's financial data
description: We integrate via API across a company’s stack to trace and reconcile millions of financial transactions across multiple systems, providing the functionality of a legacy ERP system without the time and cost of a traditional implementation.

founders.name: Lyndsey Bunting, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Blue Onion Labs. Previously VP of Finance at Birchbox and CFO at Resonance Companies. Former Peace Corps Volunteer.

founders.name: Charles McMillan, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder of Blue Onion Labs. An early engineering hire at VTS through to its 1B valuation. Previously an engineer at Spotify working on the podcaster mission

# Automatic Reconciliationwith Guaranteed Accuracy
Blue Onion's subledger was built for scale, spanning multiple systems and integrations. Proven through billions of reconciled transactions, our platform learns and improves as our customers scale.
###### [discover Blue Onion![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676430d6e17fe8389b923e09/676cfd375e4920c4d6e0e0bf_arrow-right.svg)](https://www.blueonionlabs.com/<https:/www.blueonionlabs.com/product?__hstc=17958374.90438fd2e2a5f19d325e99dc0d822462.1736413734959.1737020836703.1737116118976.14&__hssc=17958374.3.1737116118976&__hsfp=4200627391>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61dc98856049676bd9b4ceeb/67766946c315deb5073e0a25_blue%20brand%20ring%203%402x.svg)

  * # 99% Average Accuracy
When clients follow Blue Onion's methodology, they stop settling for anything less.
  * # $30B+ Transactions Reconciled
And counting. From multi-channel returns to partial refunds, we handle the complexity so you don't have to.


[OUR APPROACH](https://www.blueonionlabs.com/<#>)
# Your ERP Deserves Better Data
Our subledger ensures validated data from the source, giving you a foundation of financial truth before it ever touches your ERP system.
###### [Talk to our Team![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676430d6e17fe8389b923e09/676cfd375e4920c4d6e0e0bf_arrow-right.svg)](https://www.blueonionlabs.com/<https:/www.blueonionlabs.com/demo>)

# Daily closing—not monthly
Why wait until the end of the month? Close your books daily and get timely financial insights.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61dc98856049676bd9b4ceeb/67766946c315deb5073e0a2a_53%20checklists.svg)
# Accuracy you can count on no matter the scale
Whether you’re processing $20MM or $200MM per year, our platform reconciles with 99% average accuracy.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61dc98856049676bd9b4ceeb/67766946c315deb5073e0a29_68%20dashboard.svg)
# Cut connector costs & simplify your tech stack
Replace expensive connectors and slash ERP transaction fees. One platform to validate data first, saving you money at every step.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61dc98856049676bd9b4ceeb/67766946c315deb5073e0a28_12%20focus.svg)
# Always audit-ready
With every transaction tracked and validated from order to bank payout, you'll have complete confidence when prepping for fundraising, audits, or board meetings.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61dc98856049676bd9b4ceeb/6776695e3b16c9b029a97c28_Green%20Brand%20Ring%205.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61dc98856049676bd9b4ceeb/6776695e3b16c9b029a97c26_Yellow%20Brand%20Ring%206.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61dc98856049676bd9b4ceeb/6776695e3b16c9b029a97c29_blue%20brand%20onion%2010%20\(1\).svg)
[HOW IT WORKS](https://www.blueonionlabs.com/<#>)
# There's a Better Way to Process Financial Data
Validating after the data is in your ERP only creates inaccuracies. The Blue Onion approach validates every transaction at the source, not after the damage is done.
# 01
# Unify & Ingest
Connect your order systems, payment processors, and bank data through one automated platform. No engineering required.
# Review &Validate
Our AI platform processes every transaction through advanced matching algorithms, identifying discrepancies **_before_** they impact your books.
# 02
# 03
# Reconcile & Close
Close your books daily with a fully automated process. Validate the data directly to your ERP. Complete audit trails available anytime.

HOW IT WORKS⟨33⟩
# There's a Better Way to Process Financial Data
Validating after the data is in your ERP only creates inaccuracies. The Blue Onion approach validates every transaction at the source, not after the damage is done.
# 01
# Unify & Ingest
Connect your order systems, payment processors, and bank data through one automated platform. No engineering required.
# Review &Validate
Our AI platform processes every transaction through advanced matching algorithms, identifying discrepancies **_before_** they impact your books.
# 02
# 03
# Reconcile & Close
Close your books daily with a fully automated process. Validate the data directly to your ERP. Complete audit trails available anytime.

generated_description:
### Overview: Blue Onion Labs

**Founded:** 2020  
**Location:** New York   
**Team Size:** 20 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S20  

Blue Onion Labs is disrupting the financial data landscape by offering a single source of truth for companies' financial transactions. The company originated from a clear mission: to integrate seamlessly across a company's tech stack using APIs to trace and reconcile millions of financial transactions. What Blue Onion provides is a modern, agile alternative to traditional ERP systems, cutting down on both time and costs associated with implementation.

#### Mission & Vision
At its core, Blue Onion Labs aims to provide businesses with a definitive and accurate financial data subledger, which acts as the backbone for automated daily bookings and reconciliations. The goal is to ensure financial accuracy and efficiency, allowing businesses to close their books daily rather than on a monthly basis.

#### Technology and Integrations
The company's platform leverages AI-driven algorithms to validate data before it reaches the ERP systems, effectively preventing inaccuracies. Blue Onion offers extensive integrations with leading financial systems such as:

- **Order Systems:** Shopify
- **Payment Processors:** Stripe, PayPal, Adyen, Global-e
- **Return Management Systems:** Loop Returns, Happy Returns
- **Accounting/ERP Systems:** NetSuite, QuickBooks, Xero, Dynamics 365, Sage Intacct, among others.

#### Performance Metrics
- Over **$30 billion** in transactions reconciled.
- An impressive **99% average accuracy** in transaction processing.
- The platform has proven scalability, adapting to customers' growing needs as they process from **$20 million to $200 million** in transactions annually.

#### Client Success Stories
Leading retail and eCommerce brands, such as Supergoop! and Clean Simple Eats, have embraced Blue Onion's solutions. For instance, Clean Simple Eats reduced their month-end closing time from **60+ hours to under 5** with Blue Onion’s help. The capacity for automation significantly enhances operational efficiency and frees up critical resources.

#### Team and Leadership
Brad Flora serves as Group Partner, guiding the strategic vision of the company as it scales. The adept team is dedicated to fostering innovation and leveraging machine learning to deliver a superior financial management experience.

### What’s Next?
Blue Onion Labs is not just about connecting systems; it's about transforming how businesses perceive and manage their financial data. With a focus on providing a secure, efficient, and reliable framework for financial operations, Blue Onion is set to redefine accounting processes across the industry.

#### Discover More
If you’re interested in learning how Blue Onion Labs can transform your financial operations, check out their [website](https://www.blueonionlabs.com) for demos, case studies, and more insights into their innovative platform.
